sqlMap.statement: SELECT X.TRGT_ATTRB_TXT_01 , X.TRGT_ATTRB_TXT_02 , X.TRGT_ATTRB_TXT_03 , X.TRGT_ATTRB_TXT_04 FROM XTRNL_INTFC_XREF X WHERE X.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND X.CPO_SRC_TP_CD = #cpoSrcTpCd# AND X.INTFC_ID IS NULL AND X.INTFC_XREF_CTX_TP_CD = #intfcXrefCtxTpCd# AND X.SRC_ATTRB_TXT_01 IS NULL AND X.SRC_ATTRB_TXT_02 = #srcAttrbTxt02# AND X.SRC_ATTRB_TXT_03 = #srcAttrbTxt03# AND X.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT S.POST_CD FROM SHIP_TO_CUST S
WHERE S.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND S.LOC_NUM = #locNum# AND S.RGTN_STS_CD = #rgtnStsCd#
AND S.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
